attributes.action: To take a look again at the cost involved in staging the olympics in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that the final figure has increased by 4 times the original build and staging cost is digusting.
I do not wish any of my hard earned tax to go towards staging the olympics in London.
Yet again , it seems what ever London wants London gets, at the expense of the rest of the Country.
Are sporting clubs and other important 
facilities around the rest of Country going to suffer for the sake of London?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
